[data-task-id='13'] .b-gantt-task.title: Scheduling direction (ASAP/ALAP)
[data-task-id='13'] .b-gantt-task.content: Can be set on the `Advanced` tab of the task editor, using the `Constraint type` field.

[data-task-id='14'] .b-gantt-task.title: Backward task
[data-task-id='14'] .b-gantt-task.content: Task scheduled ALAP (backward) by the user

[data-task-id='15'] .b-gantt-task.title: Backward task
[data-task-id='15'] .b-gantt-task.content: Task with backward scheduling direction which is enforced by the predecessor
